advantages.advantage: Based on Ubuntu, which is based on the Debian distribution of Linux
It is "desktop ready" and the K desktop environment is well known for its ease of use and many features
It is easy to install and has some features that are "Proudly South African"
It is simple to install and use and is certainly recommended for the novice
If you have ADSL you can install both the Ubuntu desktop and the Kubuntu desktop on the same machine and choose which one to work on when you log on to your computer
